    • boxMesh

      public static final LMesh boxMesh​(float boxWidth, float boxDepth, float boxHeight, int columns, int rows, int layers)
      Generates a mesh in the shape of a box
      Parameters:
      boxWidth - The width of the mesh
      boxDepth - The depth of the mesh
      boxHeight - The height of the mesh
      columns - The amount of columns
      rows - The amount of rows
      layers - The amount of layers
      Returns:
      The mesh

    • planeMesh

      public static final LMesh planeMesh​(float planeWidth, float planeHeight, int columns, int rows)
      Generates a mesh in the shape of a plane
      Parameters:
      planeWidth - The width of the mesh
      planeHeight - The height of the plane
      columns - The amount of columns
      rows - The amount of rows
      Returns:
      The mesh

    • triangleMesh

      public static final LMesh triangleMesh​(LVector a, LVector b, LVector c)
      Generates a mesh in the form of a single face
      Parameters:
      a - The first vertex
      b - The second vertex
      c - The third vertex
      Returns:
      The mesh

    • faceVectices

      public static final java.util.ArrayList<LVector> faceVectices​(LFace face, LMesh parentMesh)
      Returns the vertices that make a face
      Parameters:
      face - The input face
      parentMesh - The mesh that contains the input face
      Returns:
      A list containing the face indices as vectors

      Returns the edges of a mesh

      Returns:
